程序包 com.se.aiconomy.client.controller

类 BaseController

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.client.controller.BaseController
直接已知子类:
AccountItemController, AccountsController, AddAccountController, AddBudgetController, AddTransactionController, AiController, AiOptimizePanelController, AnalyticsController, BudgetCategoryCardController, BudgetController, BudgetUpdateCardController, DashboardController, LoginController, SettingsController, SignupController, SignupFlowController2, SignupFlowController3, TransactionItemController, TransactionsController, UpdateAccountController
public abstract class BaseController extends Object
Abstract base controller class for JavaFX controllers. Provides common fields such as user information and main sidebar controller.
